title: For Marsh McLennan CIO Paul Beswick, tech talent pool in India is like ‘bottled lightning’ - Economic Times
content: For Marsh McLennan CIO Paul Beswick, tech talent pool in India is like ‘bottled lightning’  Economic Times
description: Marsh McLennan CIO Paul Beswick discusses his vision for the firms global technology team and why he refers to technology as ‘bottled lightning.
